ModMetaData.name: MineralsFrozen
ModMetaData.author: zachary-foster
ModMetaData.description:
for RimWorld B18 Hardcore SK mod version 0.5.0
<size=24>Description</size>
This mod is an expansion of the "Minerals" Mod and the "Minerals" mod be enabled and must come before in the loading order. It adds ice-related content.
See: https://github.com/zachary-foster/MineralsFrozen for detailed documentation.
